/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with trees and lampposts, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. A few cars and buses can be seen navigating the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the city. The image is taken from the perspective of a car, as evidenced by the windshield visible in the top left corner.
